channel.title: Vim on jhchabran
channel.description: Recent content in Vim on jhchabran

item.title: Vim isn't about speed
Mixed links of the week (1)
item.description: Not Rails: Rails isn’t the right answer for every project. Speeding up things with JRuby: basic example showing how JRuby obliterates MRI when it comes to threading. Building Mruby on Android : who thought that building mruby on Android would be so easy ? Fast Analytics with Redis : old tricks never dies, Redis and its bitwise operations to store analytics. Vim: efficient command mode: an interesting thread on reddit, found many Vim tips I never heard about.
